title: It Seems Like I Fell into a Reverse Harem Game - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Adapted to Manhwa   Aggressive Characters   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Empires   Enemies Become Lovers   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Handsome Male Lead   Hated Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Otome Game   Polyandry   Reverse Harem   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   S*aves   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 이늬
description:
I was just answering the phone when suddenly, an automated voice could be heard from the other side of the line:

Reset.

And game set.

After that, everything went dark, like something had turned off my life switch.

Seconds later, I opened my eyes to strange men wriggling in my bed.

“Why are you by my side?”

“It’s because I’m…… I’m Your Highness’s concubine.”

What the hell is this world?

In a strange and unfamiliar reverse world, my second life has begun.>
